snippet: U.S. Vice President Mike Pence used a private email account to conduct public business as governor of Indiana, his office said in a statement on Thursday....

headline.main: David Rubinger, 92, Photographer Who Chronicled Israeli History, Dies
headline.print_headline: David Rubinger, Who Captured Israeli History, Dies at 92

lead_paragraph: U.S. Vice President Mike Pence used a private email account to conduct public business as governor of Indiana, his office said in a statement on Thursday.
